pivLib
==========

Convenience tools for PIV analysis. Core PIV functions are imported from the `OpenPIV <https://github.com/OpenPIV/openpiv-python>`_ project. The tools here are designed to (i) streamline the PIV analysis process, (ii) provide additional convenience for PIV data processing (e.g. :py:func:`apply_mask`) and file handling (e.g. :py:class:`compact_PIV`).

.. currentmodule:: myimagelib.pivLib
